4318400.name: I WILL DO IT SOON MAYBE LATER TOMORROW
4318400.description:
A short visual novel created as a way to reflect on working on game development alone. Essentially, it is a collection of different images — some of them very real — of inner voices and sounds, shaped into a small story.

I used this format to quickly and honestly convey my state to those who will read it, and to show that if you are going through a similar crisis right now, you are not alone.

Features

  • Short narrative visual novel (~30 minutes)

  • Story focused on atmosphere and inner state

  • Themes of procrastination, creativity, and family relationships

  • Minimalist visual style

  • Original music

  • Visual imagery inspired by real-life prototypes
